articles.description: A survey of 2,053 found that 55 percent said 'no' when asked 'Will you get the COVID-19 Vaccine from Pfizer when the Department makes it available?'
articles.content:
More than half of NYC firefighters say they will not take a COVID-19 vaccine when it becomes available to them in the coming weeks.
A survey of 2,053 found that 55 percent said 'no' when asked 'Will… [+3850 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: COVID-19: NHS chief hails 'beginning of the end' of virus as vaccine begins arriving at hospitals - Sky News
articles.description: Vaccines will be distributed from Tuesday in what has been described as "one of the greatest challenges the NHS has ever faced".
